column3: I workedaround this need for this.
> I workedaround this need for this.\n\n@NicolasDorier may I ask what your workaround was?  I was very much hoping to see this PR merged, I'd love to see a workaround.

@JeremyRand I just gave up using the RPC for my projects, getting things merged here is a bit too much effort, it was easier for me to create [NBXplorer](https://github.com/dgarage/NBXplorer/) which is a lightweight block explorer for bitcoin also working on pruned mode.\n\nFeel free to rebase and take this PR if you feel the strength to get it merged, I would review.
